text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.title: MCBrowser Config
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.openLin: Opens MCBrowser instead of your external browser when you go to open a link within Minecraft.
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.asyncBr:
Makes input asynchronous to improve performance. 
Turn this off if you are having input-related issues.
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.saveCoo:
If true, browser cookies will not be deleted and will be stored in ".minecraft/config/MCBrowser/browser".
It means, your accounts logins will be saved on game restart
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.saveTab: If true, list of opened tabs will be kept on restart
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.enableM: If true, MCBrowser will have access to your microphone and webcam
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.limitBr: Limit framerate when browser is open
Helps save computational resources in certain scenarios
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.browser:
Sets the framerate when the browser is open. 
This only works if Limit framerate is turned on.
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.zoomSca: Sets how much to zoom in and out
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.killJce: Kill JCEF helper processes on shutdown

Temporary workaround to prevent lingering JCEF background processes that eat up CPU resources after minecraft is shutdown 
Turning this option off is strongly not recommended unless you are having issues with other applications that utilize JCEF.
text.autoconfig.mcbrowser.option.allowDo: Allows downloading files to your computer using MCBrowser
mcbrowser.download.toast.started.descrip: Please wait while your mod downloads.
Please wait while your resource pack downloads.
mcbrowser.download.toast.complete.descri: Restart your client for changes to take effect.
Resource Pack can be turned on in Resource Packs Settings
mcbrowser.download.toast.failed.descript: Check your logs for more info
mcbrowser.download.toast.disabled.descri: Please enable 'Allow downloads' in the mod's settings to start downloading files.
